name: Madie The Unicorn in The Cake Escape
name_original: Madie The Unicorn in The Cake Escape
description:
Madie The Unicorn in The Cake Escape is a retro styled platformer where you take control of Madie on her journey to find the slices of her missing birthday cake. 

Her quest will take her through three distinct worlds each with their own dangers and perils.

Can you find all the pieces of Madie's birthday cake and get them home safely before her birthday party? 

  • Six levels set across three worlds
  • Multiple enemy types per world
  • Classic Retro Platforming
  • Challenging Boss Battles
  • Controller support

This is my first project, it began life as a birthday present for my daughter; i have since expanded it a bit to make it a more complete experience.

Taking inspiration from the platformers i started playing as a kid, i tried to emulate the feel of the 16-bit days of Sonic, B.O.B, Decap Attack, Ristar and Castle of Illusion etc.

Hope you enjoy
